channel.title: The Daily Star – Opinion
channel.description: Latest opinion pieces from The Daily Star

item.title: The primary teachers’ strike is a mirror held up to Bangladesh
item.description: A primary school teacher on strike was seen bleeding profusely from the wounds inflicted by the agitated guardians who blamed him and his colleagues for turning their wards into hostages to push for better pay and benefit.

item.title: Let's uplift the women who build our city
item.description: Each morning, long before the city awakens, I envision the women who bear its bones—the bricks, the sand, the mortar—in their hands and upon their heads, walking into the dawn of Dhaka.

item.title: ‘Air pollution does not discriminate; it impacts everyone’
item.description: Pema Gyamtsho, director general of Nepal-based International Centre for Integrated Mountain Development (ICIMOD), shared his views with Porimol Palma of The Daily Star on the challenges and potential solutions to air pollution during a workshop in Nepal in late November.
